cards.title: Ownership
setup: Put this card and the Map card into play, “Stay Positive” side up. Put each Stat card under the Map card. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever a villain Modification is revealed, put it under this card. Then, if there are 3 or more cards under this card, play 1 of them and discard the rest.

At the start of each hero turn, reveal cards from the villain deck until a Weather Effect is revealed. Put it into play and discard the other revealed cards. If no card entered play this way, shuffle the villain trash into the villain deck.
At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the environment deck and 1 Replica from the villain trash.
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, add 3 tokens to each player's Stat card.
flippedGameplay: When this card flips to this side, discard each card under it.
When a villain Modification is destroyed, remove it from the game.
At the start of each hero turn, discard the top card of the villain deck. If it's a Weather Effect, play it.
At the end of the villain turn, {OwnershipCharacter} deals each hero character 5 infernal damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, move each marker in row 0 1 space left, then move each other marker 1 space down.

cards.title: Levels
setup: Each player puts a card from under this card in their play area “eDensity” side up and adds 30 tokens to it.
gameplay: This card and villain Stat cards are indestructible.
When a hero target deals a non-hero target 3 or more damage, add 2 tokens to that player's Stat card and {SunSun} deals itself 1 infernal damage.
When 8 or more damage is dealt to non-hero targets by hero targets during a player's turn, add 5 tokens to their Stat card and {SunSun} deals itself 3 infernal damage.
When a hero is dealt melee damage by a villain target, remove 2 tokens from their Stat card.
When {SunSun} is destroyed, remove it from the game, then flip {OwnershipCharacter} and this card, leaving all markers in place.
flippedGameplay: When this card flips to this side, put each villain Stat card under this card.
This card and villain Stat cards are indestructible.
When a player's marker moves to row 4, column 4, put a card from under this card in their play area “Rogue” side up.
When a player's marker moves to row 0, column 0, destroy each hero target in their play area.
After a player plays a card or uses a power, each player may discard a card. If {H - 2} cards are discarded this way, move another player's marker 1 space up, down, left, or right.
At the end of the villain turn, move each player's marker to the space indicated by the red arrow starting from its current space.

cards.title: eDensity
setup: Put your marker on the Map at row 1, column X, where X = your place in the hero turn order minus 1.
gameplay: Whenever tokens are added to or removed from this card, move your marker on the Map to row Y, where Y = 4 minus (the number of tokens on this card divided by 10, rounded down).
This card can't have more than 49 tokens on it.

At the end of your turn, if your marker is in row 0 or 1, you may destroy 1 of your Ongoing or Equipment cards. If your marker is in row 0 or 1 and no card was destroyed this way, {OwnershipCharacter} deals your hero 4 melee damage.
flippedGameplay: Hero targets in this play area are immune to fire damage.
Increase damage dealt by hero targets in this play area to {OwnershipCharacter} by 5.
If your marker is in row 1, 2, or 3 and in column 1, 2, or 3, increase damage dealt by hero targets in this play area to {OwnershipCharacter} by an additional 20.
If your marker is at row 2, column 2, increase damage dealt by hero targets in this play area to {OwnershipCharacter} by an additional 100.

cards.title: Alternate
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
When this card enters play, replace a hero character card in this play area with a variant of that hero, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Black Hole(Black Hole)
body: At the start of each turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.
When 12 or more damage is dealt to non-hero targets by hero targets in one turn, destroy a non-target villain Modification, chosen at random, then {OwnershipCharacter} regains 12 HP.

cards.title: Chorby Soul II
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
At the end of each hero turn, if no damage was dealt to non-hero targets by hero targets this turn, this card deals a hero character in this turn's play area 2 projectile damage.

cards.title: Equal Sun
body: At the start of each turn, if exactly 7 damage was dealt to non-hero targets by hero targets last turn, increase the next damage dealt by a hero target by 7.

cards.title: Expansion
body: This card is indestructible. When this card enters play, choose a hero character card from the box and put it into play next to this card.
At the end of the villain turn, if the character next to this card is active, one player plays the top card of their deck and another player's hero may use the power on this character.

cards.title: Fairgrounds
body: Whenever 8 or more damage is dealt to non-hero targets by hero targets during a player's turn, discard the top card of that player's deck. If it's an Equipment card or a target, play it.

cards.title: Flippers
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
When a hero in this play area would be dealt cold damage by a villain target, prevent that damage and that hero deals 1 target 3 projectile damage.

cards.title: Flood Balloons
body: Play this card in the environment play area. When an environment card leaves play, if there are no environment cards in play, destroy this card.
When a hero character is dealt 2 or more cold damage, remove 4 tokens from their Stat card.

cards.title: Flooding
body: At the start of each turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.
When this card enters play during a player's turn, that player may destroy 1 of their Ongoing or Equipment cards. If they don't, {OwnershipCharacter} deals their hero 2 cold damage.
cards.flavorText: A surge of Immateria{BR}rushes up from Under!{BR}Baserunners are swept from play!

cards.title: Gaudy
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
Increase damage dealt by hero targets in this play area by X, where X = the number of Ballpark Modification cards in play.

cards.title: Heat Magnet
body: Play this card in the environment play area. When an environment card leaves play, if there are no environment cards in play, destroy this card.
When a hero character is dealt 4 or more fire damage, that hero character deals 1 target 3 lightning damage 3 times.

cards.title: Hot Air Balloons
body: Play this card in the environment play area. When an environment card leaves play, if there are no environment cards in play, destroy this card.
When a hero character is dealt 4 or more fire damage, remove 6 tokens from their Stat card.

cards.title: Light-Handed
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
At the end of this player's turn, remove X counters from their Stat card, where X = the number of non-character target and Equipment cards in this play area.

cards.title: New Megan Ito IV
body: At the start of each hero turn, discard the top card of that player's deck. If the discarded card is a One-Shot, play it. Otherwise, this card deals a hero character in that play area 2 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: [b]For a Limited Time{BR}The ILB Gift Shop is offering{BR}Ancient Legends![/b]

cards.title: Night
body: At the start of each turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.

When this card enters play during a player's turn, discard the top card of that player's deck. If it's an Ongoing or Equipment card, they put 1 of their non-character cards in play on the bottom of their deck and play the discarded card.
cards.flavorText: Night Shift.{BR}Deep Darkness took Bevan Wise.{BR}Kirkland Sobremesa clocked in.

cards.title: Polarity
body: At the start of each turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.

When this card enters play during a player's turn, discard the top card of that player's deck. If it's a One-Shot card, whenever the Map card would add 2 tokens to a Stat card this turn, remove 2 tokens from that Stat card instead.

cards.title: Power Chaarge
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
Whenever a hero target in this play area deals a non-hero target exactly 2 damage, increase damage dealt by hero targets in this play area this turn by 1.

cards.title: Reload
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
When a hero target in this play area deals a non-hero target 5 or more damage, increase the next damage dealt by a hero target by 2.

cards.title: Smithy
body: Play this card in the environment play area. When an environment card leaves play, if there are no environment cards in play, destroy this card.
At the end of the environment turn, one player may put an Ongoing or Equipment card from their trash on top of their deck.

cards.title: Sum Sun
body: At the start of each turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.
Whenever a target is dealt damage, increase damage dealt this phase by 1.

cards.title: Sun .1
body: At the start of each turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.
Whenever a power is used, a non-villain card is played, or a card is drawn, increase damage dealt this turn by 1.

cards.title: Sun(Sun)
body: At the start of the villain turn, this card regains {H + 1} HP.
When a hero character is dealt 4 or more fire damage, this card deals itself 3 infernal damage.
When another villain Sun card is played, this card deals itself 5 infernal damage.
cards.flavorText: [b]Inflation will keep Us afloat{BR}As We get things Squared Away.[/b]

cards.title: Supernova Eclipse
body: At the start of each turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.
When this card enters play during a player's turn, {OwnershipCharacter} deals each hero target in that player's play area 2 fire damage. Increase damage dealt to character cards this way by 2.
cards.flavorText: [b]Wow! Look at those colors!{BR}Yes, Sun(Sun) appears to have exploded.{BR}There is no reason to panic.[/b]

cards.title: Underachiever
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
Whenever the Map card would add 2 tokens to this play area's Stat card, remove 2 tokens from that Stat card instead.

cards.title: Undersea
body: Play this card in the hero play area with the fewest Modification cards.
Whenever damage that would be dealt by a hero target in this play area is reduced to 0 or less, increase damage dealt by hero targets in this play area this turn by 1.
